Package poker.socket.java.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
poker.socket.java.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
A class to represent a single game on the server

      public void initializeGame()
      Initializes the game, giving money to players and taking ante from them. Deals everyone 5 cards.

    • nextPhase

      public void nextPhase()
      Changes game's round when proceeding to next one

    • proceedBettingRound

      public void proceedBettingRound()
      Takes care of both first and second betting rounds. Makes sure everyone has had his turn, proceeds when players' bets are equal or starts over from first betting round when only one player is left not folding

    • resetTurnOnNewPhase

      public void resetTurnOnNewPhase()
      When proceeding to next round, starts turn with the first player on the right side of the dealer

    • comparePlayersCards

      public void comparePlayersCards()
      Sorts players by their hand power, so the winner can be evaluated

    • distributePot

      public void distributePot()
      Distributes pot to the winner

    • proceedAfterComparingCards

      public void proceedAfterComparingCards()
      Proceeds after set is over. Starting new set or ending game where there is only one player left
